Class COM.sootNsmoke.instructions.Wide 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----COM.sootNsmoke.instructions.Sequence
           |
           +----COM.sootNsmoke.instructions.Wide
public class Wide
extends Sequence
An abstraction if the Wide opcode. Takes three arguments: an opcode, and index, and an optional constant. The opcode must be a load instruction {i,a,l,f,d}, a store instruction {i,a,l,f,d}, a ret instruction, or iinc. The index is the index argument to the opcode. The constant is permitted only for the iinc opcode.

Wide(int, int)
Wide(int, int, int)

toBytecodes(Bytecodes)
Converts the instruction sequence to an array of bytecodes.

 public Wide(int opcode,
             int index)

             int index,
             int constant)
